forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
A bright morning unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, with the sun asserting its presence in an azure sky that hints at warmth. Temperatures are set to reach a comfortable 68 degrees, perfect for a leisurely day spent outdoors. As the morning progresses, a gentle north wind kisses the city, its whistling notes making the leaves sway lightly while carrying a hint of the ocean's brine. By afternoon, the temperature will dip to around 63, embracing the familiar evening chill that cloaks the city.

Clarity reigns, with no sign of the fog that often lingers near the bay. The air is crisp, free of the marine layer that can obscure views in this coastal paradise, making this day an invitation to wander the winding streets or perhaps find a cozy spot at a local café, watching the city’s bustle. Dress in layers that allow the freedom to adapt to the day’s fluctuating embrace—perhaps a light sweater as the breeze picks up in the late afternoon. With no fog to hedge your plans, this is an ideal day to explore the hidden gems of San Francisco, from the artistic corners of the Mission District to a discovery at the waterfront, where the world seems to converge in a symphony of community and culture.
